name: Archipelago (itch)
description:
Short Description:

Archipelago is a neat-o little adventure game with puzzle solving, detailed maps and snarky humor. This game is an entry to the Indie Game Maker Contest 2018.

You play as Edward, the sarcastic and slightly kooky sea dog who finds himself stranded on a mysterious island. Venture deeper into the island to uncover the secrets it holds.
